label: HPC Pack 2016 Compute Node on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: HPC Pack 2016 Compute Node on Windows Server 2012 R2
summary: Enterprise-class High Performance Computing solution that is simple to deploy, cost-effective, application-focused, and user-centric.
description: This image contains the Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter operating system with HPC Pack 2016 installed to create the compute node of a Microsoft HPC Pack 2016 cluster in Azure. We recommend using a VM size of at least A3. It is strongly recommended to use the Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates to automatically create an HPC Pack 2016 cluster in Azure with the HPC Pack 2016 images. For more information see here.
